events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size I ordered does not fit me at all.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding size issues and return.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's request for returning the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return the jacket due to size issues. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging for the refund eligibility?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The jacket is still new, tags attached, and in the original packaging as it arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once you ship the jacket back to us using the pre-paid return label I will send shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for making the return process easy. I'll send it back as soon as I get the label.
We've received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should be back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now, but please do not hesitate to reach out for any future support needs.
